actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that certain civil and criminal penalties applicable to the unauthorized disclosure of any tax return or return information may be imposed only if such unauthorized disclosure is willful.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that certain civil and criminal penalties applicable to the unauthorized disclosure of any tax return or return information may be imposed only if such unauthorized disclosure is willful.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that certain civil and criminal penalties applicable to the unauthorized disclosure of any tax return or return information may be imposed only if such unauthorized disclosure is willful.
